title: Let's Call the Whole Thing off...
content:
A fun way to show differences in Boulder id and Boulder ego:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905062219im_/http:/typophile.com/files/call-the-whole-thing-off_5159.png)

ChrisL

author: dezcom

comments.content: I love your naming scheme, Chris!
Bolder Egho ! You forgot that . I love “h”s , it is like a invisible letter. Good stuff Chris :-)

Thanks Jesse and André!  
Would I have to “Leggo my ehgo” then? :-)

ChrisL
I tried to test it on your site, but something is buggy over there ... Yes, you can Leggho your Egho - today !

My site is not live yet. I will let you know when somethingis happening there, though. Thanks for trying!

ChrisL

_My site is not live yet._

Ah, **that’s** why I had problems when I wandered over there one time...

Most of the links are dead at the document level and most of the text is just dummy filler.

ChrisL
